in an interactive session, you can/should now inspect the content of theme code # before proceeding # theme_expression  # eval to create the final theme function theme_solarized <- eval(theme_expression)  ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = hp)) +    geom_histogram(binwidth = 25) +   labs(title = "Horsepower Distribution") +   theme_solarized() #
